The ambitious push signals a strategic reset for sustained growth and India's developed economy goal.

title: Chinese billionaire’s plan: Gaming tycoon fathered 100 children
description: Chinese billionaire Xu Bo reportedly aims to father at least 20 US-born children to inherit his $1.1 billion gaming fortune, bypassing domestic birth restrictions. This mirrors a trend among ultra-wealthy men like Pavel Durov and Elon Musk, who are also expanding their biological legacies through modern means.

title: Jake Paul & Jutta Leerdam net worth in 2025: Boxing, Olympics and business deals
description: Power couple Jake Paul and Jutta Leerdam boast a combined net worth of $205 million in 2025.  Paul's wealth stems from boxing and business ventures, while Leerdam's comes from Olympic speed skating and sponsorships. Both are actively pursuing their respective careers, with Paul recently engaging in high-profile boxing matches and Leerdam preparing for upcoming international events.
